body: Email from Elite Educational Institute of San Jose SAT Winter CAMPS In Person or Online An 11-week program Eliteâ€™s SAT Prep Program combines weekly full-length practice tests with targeted lessons. Tests including a combination of College Board exams and Elite-designed assessments that reflect the latest SAT trends. This consistent cycle of testing, review, and targeted instruction is designed to accelerate progress and build confidence leading up to the official exam. Winter Break Schedule (December 22 to January 2)  Weekly Test: Monday at 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Weekly Class: Tuesday, Friday, Saturday at 9:00 AM - 12:30 PM Office Hour: offered in Week 2 Friday & Saturday 12:30 - 1:30 PM  Weekend Schedule (January 9 to March 7) Weekly Test: Friday at 4:00 - 7:00 PM or Saturday 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM Weekly Class: Saturday at 1:30 PM -5:00 PM Office Hour: TBD ACT Winter CAMPS In Person or Online A 7-week program Each week, students will take a full-length practice ACT test under realistic testing conditions, along with dedicated classes focusing on each section of the test: English, Mathematics, Reading, and Science. Our carefully-crafted curriculum and team of expert teachers will give you the confidence you need to reach your goal ACT score. Winter Break Schedule (December 22 to January 2)  Weekly Test: Monday & Friday at 1:30 PM - 5:00 PM Weekly Class: Tuesday & Saturday at 1:30 PM - 5:30 PM Office Hour: offered in Week 2 Friday & Saturday 12:30 - 1:30 PM  Weekend Schedule (January 8 to February 7) Weekly Test: Thursday or Friday at 4:00 - 7:30 PM Weekly Class: Saturday at 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM Office Hour: TBD The office hour sessions provide students individualized attention and comprehensive support to help them excel on the SAT or ACT during our camps. Contact us today to secure your spotâ€” Early bird registration for $150 off ends on October 31, 2025! subject: Competition Wrap-Up: Stanford RNA 3D Folding
snippet: Hi Albert Nguyen, The Stanford RNA 3D Folding competition showed what's possible when Kagglers bring creativity, collaboration and data skills to one of biology's toughest puzzles. Participants
body:
Kaggle








Hi Albert Nguyen,

The Stanford RNA 3D Folding competition showed what's possible when  
Kagglers bring creativity, collaboration and data skills to one of  
biology's toughest puzzles.

Participants worked to predict how RNA folds into the 3D shapes that  
determine its function â€” a challenge that has stumped researchers for  
decades. Kagglers made progress that could accelerate breakthroughs in  
medicine and biotechnology.

For the first time, automated methods for RNA 3D structure prediction have  
reached human-competitive performance in blind tests. While many teams  
turned to deep learning, the winning solution by G. John Rao took a  
different path â€” using a handcrafted, highly optimized pipeline that  
revived a classic strategy: template-based modeling.

With over 2,400 submissions, the competition highlighted the power of open  
science. Explore the winning projects to see the wide range of creative  
methods and ideas that emerged.





Learn More




Happy Kaggling!

The Kaggle Team



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to azero2113@gmail.com because you indicated that you'd  
like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to receive  
these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also change  
your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at kaggle.com.

subject: Competition Launch: CAFA 6 Protein Function Prediction
snippet: Hi Albert Nguyen, Proteins are essential molecules that perform a wide range of functions in all living things. They act as enzymes, provide structure to cells and tissues, support immune defense,
body:
Kaggle








Hi Albert Nguyen,

Proteins are essential molecules that perform a wide range of functions in  
all living things. They act as enzymes, provide structure to cells and  
tissues, support immune defense, transport molecules, and regulate growth,  
repair and energy production. Yet, despite their importance, the functions  
of many proteins remain unknown.

In this competition, you'll build a model to predict the biological  
function of proteins from their amino acid sequences. Using Gene Ontology,  
you'll assign labels that describe what a protein does, the processes it's  
involved in and where it operates within the cell.





Total Prizes:

$50,000


Entry Deadline:

January 26, 2026




Learn More



Your work could help researchers better understand how cells function,  
support the discovery of new treatments and even earn you a spot as a  
co-author on a scientific publication.

Good luck,

Martyna Plomecka
Kaggle Research Scientist



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to azero2113@gmail.com because you indicated that you'd  
like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to receive  
these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also change  
your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at kaggle.com.

subject: Better than homework
snippet: twilio Your Twilio Developer Digest - September 2025 Edition. Where has the year gone? Up here in the Northern Hemisphere, we're seeing Summer turn into Fall. But despite the changing seasons â€“ and
body:
Where has the year gone? 

Up here in the Northern Hemisphere, weâ€™re seeing Summer turn into Fall. But despite the changing seasons â€“ and the changing newsletter templates! â€“ the Twilio Developer Digest is back in your inbox, serving up that incredible technical content you love.

This month, weâ€™re thrilled to announce the new Twilio Developer Hub! There, weâ€™ll aggregate developer content from across our channels and sites and share content themes to inspire you on your journey. This month weâ€™re featuring ConversationRelay, which lets you build human-like AI voice experiences with voice.

And with that, letâ€™s Digest. Build Multimodal Conversational AI Experiences with Twilio and the OpenAI Realtime API

OpenAI recently released their Realtime API to General Availability, opening up native speech-to-speech interactions. See our release tutorials, integrations, and sample apps (and learn about our <AiSession> TwiML feature pilot!). See the resources.

Vibe Coding with an Agent and Twilio SMS Watch an AI agent build an SMS dashboard from scratch. Twilioâ€™s Amanda Lange demonstrates what happens when an AI agent is allowed to create files, write code, and build a complete .NET application. Unleash the (Claude Code-powered) beast. Build Generative AI Email Experiences using SendGrid Inbound Parse

Twilio's Dan Bartlett demonstrates how to receive and parse inbound emails using SendGrid's Inbound Parse feature, along with a combination of Amazon AWS features and services. Then, in Part 2, he shows how to formulate and send replies with Generative AI, over AWS Bedrock. That’s intelligent!

Compliance Toolkit: AI-powered Support for SMS Compliance

Twilio's Compliance Toolkit (Public Beta) helps mitigate your compliance exposure by using artificial intelligence and machine learning to proactively detect potential regulatory violations and prevent or reschedule messaging transmission.

Try the Compliance Toolkit Beta. MCP-Based .NET Micro-Weather Wisdom SMS Service Using Twilio & OpenAI

Build an SMS service that texts you smart weather advice every morning. Think "19°C and rainy: grab a jacket and leave early" instead of basic forecasts. Weather data, smarter.

Breaking the Monolith: How We Used the Strangler Fig Pattern to Transform Segmentâ€™s Notification Architecture

At Segment, we just rewrote our alerts and notifications architecture. Instead of a "big bang" rewrite and a risky switchover, we used the Strangler Fig pattern, rewriting core components one at a time. See how we did it.

Build a Smart Inventory Chatbot on WhatsApp with LangChain, LangGraph, OpenAI, and Flask

Chatbots can do more than just keyword-match. Learn how to create an AI-powered inventory bot that understands context, places orders, checks stock, and handles real conversations. AI that gets it.

A Heartfelt Thanks to Our Community of Builders

Twilio was named to Fast Company's 2025 Best Workplaces for Innovators list, which recognizes companies that foster creative cultures and empower every team member to drive innovation.

See How We Innovate! If you love the Developer Digest, share it on X or follow us on social! Â© 2025 Twilio. subject: Launch: NFL Big Data Bowl 2026 - Prediction and Analytics
snippet: Hi Albert Nguyen, The NFL Big Data Bowl is back, this time with two separate competitions to test your machine learning skills. Use real NFL player tracking data (Next Gen Stats) to analyze player
body:
Kaggle








Hi Albert Nguyen,

The NFL Big Data Bowl is back, this time with two separate competitions to  
test your machine learning skills.

Use real NFL player tracking data (Next Gen Stats) to analyze player  
movement during the downfield pass.

With $100,000 in total prizes, there are multiple ways to participate in  
this year's Big Data Bowl. You can enter one or both challenges, each with  
its own focus on player movements during a pass.

Prediction Competition
Build models to track every step, turn, and sprint after the quarterback  
releases the ball.





Total Prizes:

$50,000


Entry Deadline:

November 26, 2025




Learn More - Prediction



Analytics Hackathon
Create insights for coaches and fans: new metrics, strategy comparisons, or  
visual breakdowns of key play moments.



Total Prizes:

$50,000


Final Submission:

December 17, 2025




Learn More - Analytics



Your work could influence how football is seen, studied, and understood for  
coaches on the sideline, analysts in the booth, and fans everywhere who  
live for the next big play.

Happy modeling,

Addison Howard
Kaggle Competitions



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to azero2113@gmail.com because you indicated that you'd  
like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to receive  
these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also change  
your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at kaggle.com.

View in browser (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg5jMY8W69t95C6lZ3nlW139RyD78J7WFN55PYPHrKbnLMqpyDFD39lKW2TbbMQ4cV0dxW1nsFn91JT2R4W27Y_Pv7BDZMqW6_J4Mr5fbz06W23KVtq6rbtSbW81L1Kd4RkZMbVjPJG76_FSs6N4XSngF1Hk0DVmszzG1QrW1rW7R3Tr67rkzWPN7Lt9F7wbNhNW1X9H755LMVgPW1jXD3S2X9chbW65j4Pc1cfl8LW20W6CL6LZh0GN21l9l7TtsG2W3NBJt17p_fk5N3cFVMNrPn21W3cfkb015tDr4W7FzjF77dN1-LW5x7J037VfS_gW8b1gYp1vCTQSW3RZSX51xzHR4W8P5sJw3nT5LsW7TvMqS5WfHd7W47YfLH1CWdzDW36xMz43lN0r6W7Hmpnr4K8_24W4Z311c6lTN_wW6BDRyP8-lmmRW1mGsfz2_pTz9W4Tmps14HTQjjW6T3v88727z3YdjkV-n04 )

Render Recap

September
2025

This month, we're highlighting new ways to speed up your static content and integrate with your favorite AI tools.

Plus, join the waitlist for Render Workflows, the next-gen framework for durable and scalable task execution.

For all the latest updates, see the changelog (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLD-2-dFMW5BW0B06lZ3mXV8lW_S1Tn4DPW8xWl743Nt_FrW6BfWp56krT9KW5C3PYP7dgskTW6lbsXS5Fd2XkW4m8QdK4hpScgW7Vl_FQ60jQPfW8sb5Lx53GMb2W2xvfps3MMg5xN6SMM8XVd9rRW1ZLT4g7ZkNbYW8tKZ_k2TP9xzW1y1BSr5nftmmW66KsJ-7_SKF0W1ls-Gr8K37PLW1DM3WY1bcPzNW5lPtt-3RGn-0W5GZDrZ7zRhVDf52xH6d04 ) .

Spotlight

Coming Soon

Join the waitlist for Render Workflows (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLD-2-dFMW5BW0B06lZ3m0W61Pdn_4xGjZvW505xCl27-Q1NW1z5vH058dHH2W1YQYYw6qPrxSW6-FgdN5LmtV_W4wtggj1-Sr5SVx_1P_1FfQf-W1GwGcF3cxvSjW8ltWg28BghcNW73x-7m7BPjS4W77V7lW3DSkHMW8lgXKK37TVxsW4j3G0P5flDHgN9l8cn344BqxW6HRVRd85wh4RW7JCpls5Q8PctN8DVQX8rGCksN1KhhkWnDYC0f7WC1Vl04 )

Dispatch thousands of background jobs on scalable compute with automatic retries and full observabilityâ€”all orchestrated and provisioned right on Render.

Looking for a simpler way to manage AI agents and ETL pipelines? Queue up (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLD-2-dFMW5BW0B06lZ3m0W61Pdn_4xGjZvW505xCl27-Q1NW1z5vH058dHH2W1YQYYw6qPrxSW6-FgdN5LmtV_W4wtggj1-Sr5SVx_1P_1FfQf-W1GwGcF3cxvSjW8ltWg28BghcNW73x-7m7BPjS4W77V7lW3DSkHMW8lgXKK37TVxsW4j3G0P5flDHgN9l8cn344BqxW6HRVRd85wh4RW7JCpls5Q8PctN8DVQX8rGCksN1KhhkWnDYC0f7WC1Vl04 ) .

New Release

Debug faster with the Render MCP server (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3n6W8M9TGg5R1SB0W2-VXlq7LZm_mN8m7JdDbphcjW51X9X-7G_29SW1x2f1r4GRBZmW1fdBQC6MBcsDW53V0yf9fGtC6W3T3BLX7WM6HcW2BzY9772qFjVW7C8B9b2PcnXMW3pXPGg64hb6ZVP5rR72wY3t9VsrlGF1Sd4TGN4BXm6J2606lW7KfMPy5NytW9V5-Xzy8cWC5TW8mpmG71wvWQgN4djjR1f2KnzW20wqtM6dPkkBW4q_LcC4lD8vDddS6SY04 )

Interact with your Render infrastructure directly from AI tools like Cursor and Claude Code.

Create new services, query your databases, and analyze performance metricsâ€”all with natural language prompts. Get started. (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3n6W8M9TGg5R1SB0W2-VXlq7LZm_mN8m7JdDbphcjW51X9X-7G_29SW1x2f1r4GRBZmW1fdBQC6MBcsDW53V0yf9fGtC6W3T3BLX7WM6HcW2BzY9772qFjVW7C8B9b2PcnXMW3pXPGg64hb6ZVP5rR72wY3t9VsrlGF1Sd4TGN4BXm6J2606lW7KfMPy5NytW9V5-Xzy8cWC5TW8mpmG71wvWQgN4djjR1f2KnzW20wqtM6dPkkBW4q_LcC4lD8vDddS6SY04 )

New Release

Enable edge caching to serve static assets with lightning speed (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3mtVMgHwC91KcskW3Fwmwq2zl5FMW8sZ9Y43shprrVdzdys1jtrVQW4pl1CV87zXzPW4182r03wFLSzV-_vRJ2rrTBhW6GzwzG7CrSNWW5gfrrc5wWyPmW7d8PHD33n4zRW3kM9Sn4ZGvgFW1V-Pmx4Fl1DxVl__lY9ltQj5W2lGQ647RgRNnW3WWlW_615YT0W6Qc6T5704B-7W9jtWhr6VQh3-W3gVzpN5lQ7-BW2ygfwr7jwwsNW4c8Jgt2lMWKvf8p8dFn04 )

For dynamic web apps that serve static content (like images and documents), edge caching can dramatically improve response times while reducing server load:

Diagram illustrating edge caching on Render (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3mtVMgHwC91KcskW3Fwmwq2zl5FMW8sZ9Y43shprrVdzdys1jtrVQW4pl1CV87zXzPW4182r03wFLSzV-_vRJ2rrTBhW6GzwzG7CrSNWW5gfrrc5wWyPmW7d8PHD33n4zRW3kM9Sn4ZGvgFW1V-Pmx4Fl1DxVl__lY9ltQj5W2lGQ647RgRNnW3WWlW_615YT0W6Qc6T5704B-7W9jtWhr6VQh3-W3gVzpN5lQ7-BW2ygfwr7jwwsNW4c8Jgt2lMWKvf8p8dFn04 )

Powered by Render's global CDN, edge caching is available for all paid web services. Turn it on (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFg2-dFMW69sMD-6lZ3mtVMgHwC91KcskW3Fwmwq2zl5FMW8sZ9Y43shprrVdzdys1jtrVQW4pl1CV87zXzPW4182r03wFLSzV-_vRJ2rrTBhW6GzwzG7CrSNWW5gfrrc5wWyPmW7d8PHD33n4zRW3kM9Sn4ZGvgFW1V-Pmx4Fl1DxVl__lY9ltQj5W2lGQ647RgRNnW3WWlW_615YT0W6Qc6T5704B-7W9jtWhr6VQh3-W3gVzpN5lQ7-BW2ygfwr7jwwsNW4c8Jgt2lMWKvf8p8dFn04 ) with a few clicks.

Platform improvements

Service Ops

SSH into specific service instances (https://d2xMk204.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/GG+113/d2xMk204/VVywHb4L-v1vW3zTlSR5tpYghW89-nNw5CXRWxN8XrLFT2-dFMW7lCdLW6lZ3mQW65P73Y2-_nDhW6z07GP4Dfr3ZW3y3Q0D23St0zW8fFqS52YnbgvW8xW-C22xDTFQW2fz3GR6sn57XW42bc0q6bjlFvW84TG8319XBLrW3cpfH85CNg16W8CTJBr3rjDtGW3F01ms1WQd71W1jWV0z7GtVG1W33fS4s1wNR74V5gyfs4ywkT1V2r72N47T8fRN47SZK6sqQwhW9bGll-7Fw3hDW4VPLJ32Zbj0bW2KtrfZ4DB4pCVX7LnK3lMMBkW3qfSX68D1hk9W7cbxJg4jjfcPW6-4nSV5gLYKpW1jWznW3n214sf6KD9f604 )

You can now specify which instance of a scaled service you want to SSH into, both from your terminal and from the service's Shell page in the dashboard. Learn more.
